title: Manually fix broken gallery images and deploy Draft Version 6

requirements.text: Manually verify that the user-uploaded image files referenced by the UI exist in `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. If they are missing, locate the same image files in the repository root upload directory and move/copy them into `frontend/public/assets/generated/` so they are served publicly at the exact URLs used by the site.

quotes: Please manually check the frontend/public/assets/generated folder. If my images are not there, find them in the root upload directory and move them.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/1770877868282~2-2.png` exists in the repository and is readable as a static asset.
`frontend/public/assets/generated/1770877868282~2-3.png` exists in the repository and is readable as a static asset.
Visiting `/assets/generated/1770877868282~2-2.png` and `/assets/generated/1770877868282~2-3.png` on the deployed site returns the image content (not a 404).

requirements.text: Update all frontend image `src` references (including any React component `` usages) so they point directly to the correct public paths for the moved images under `/assets/generated/...`, and ensure no remaining references point to missing files.

quotes: Then, update the src tags in my HTML to point directly to the new file paths.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx` image paths resolve to valid public URLs under `/assets/generated/` for Baby Booties and Hair Crochet Clips (and any other images referenced by the page).
On the deployed site, the category grid shows actual images (no broken image icons) for Baby Booties and Hair Crochet Clips.
There are no console errors in the browser related to failing to load images from `/assets/generated/` (404/ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED).

requirements.text: Create and deploy Draft Version 6 after the asset placement and `src` updates are verified, and update `frontend/public/draft-version.txt` to indicate Version 6.

quotes: Give me a Version 6 once this is fixed.

acceptanceCriteria: Draft Version 6 is deployed and the live site renders the updated images correctly.

constraints: Do not route images through the backend; images must be served from `frontend/public/assets/generated` as static assets.
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not implement new backend logic or add new backend endpoints.
Do not redesign the page layout or change non-image content beyond what is necessary to fix broken image paths.
